channel.title: mycatalog updates
channel.description: 'My Catalog' uses the IBM Cloud catalog API to retrieve data from the catalog. It attempts to be as accurate as possible. This feed shows additions, updates, removals from the catalog. Use with care. It is a work-in-progress :)

item.title: [updated] Lyve Data Transfer Services (seagate-lyve-subscription-per-tb) was made available in the Osaka catalog
[updated] Lyve Data Transfer Services (seagate-lyve-subscription-per-tb) was made available in the Tokyo catalog
[added] Power Virtual Server DR Automation (power-dr-automation)
item.description: IBM Power Virtual Server DR AutomationÂ® simplifies disaster recovery by automating the recovery of virtual machines, leveraging IBM Cloud infrastructure to offer a flexible, scalable, and efficient DR process. Use DR Automation to ensure the continuity of operations with minimal manual intervention.
